pages.text: This powerful $(l:bewitchment:rituals/rituals)Ritual$() teleports anything in its vicinity to a target location.$(br2)This works really well with $(l:bewitchment:tools/waystone)Waystone$(), as it allows teleporting entities in remote places.$(br2)You may use either a $(l:bewitchment:tools/taglock)Taglock$() or $(l:bewitchment:tools/waystone)Waystone$() for this $(l:bewitchment:rituals/rituals)Ritual$().
